message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm keeping the majority.
Not good enough, I want a fair share!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still willing to compromise!
You're getting closer, but I still want more.
Not yet, I'm not willing to give up more!
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I'm not budging further!
You're not budging? I'll try to get closer to 50/50
Not quite there yet, I want a bit more!
Let's meet in the middle, a 55/45 split is fair!
I'm getting closer to 50/50, meet me halfway!
Alright, a 50/50 split it is! Let's shake on it!
